name: NutritionAnthropometricMeasurementsGrouping
title: Nutrition Anthropometric Measurements Grouping
description: (Clinical Focus: Anthropometric measurements that are used as part of a nutrition assessment.),(Data Element Scope: Anthropometric data, such as, height, weight, body mass index (BMI), growth pattern indices/percentiles, weight history, hand grip strength, and other indices that are part of a nutrition assessment.),(Inclusion Criteria: Inclusion criteria are data elements in SNOMED-CT and LOINC),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
